DOC.brief_summary: The aim study investigate sterility ethyl-chloride topical anesthetic spray use prior injection . The hypothesis spray change sterility injection site skin prepped .
DOC.detailed_description: This IRB-approved , prospective , blind , control study . In first set experiment , skin sterility assess . Healthy adult subject prepare mock injection shoulder knee . No injection perform . Each site set 3 skin culture : 1 ) prior alcohol prep ( pre-prep ) , 2 ) post-alcohol prep ( pre-spray ) , 3 ) ethyl-chloride spray site ( post-spray ) . In second set experiment , sterility ethyl chloride test directly culture liquid spray bottle .
DOC.criteria: age 1885 healthy skin shoulder knee area allergy ethylchloride skin lesion shoulder knee
